argument.description: Expressions that return a value of either a DATE or TIMESTAMP data type.

Expressions that return a value of either a DATE or TIMESTAMP data type.
Expressions that return a value of either a DATE or TIMESTAMP data type.

description: The MONTHS_BETWEEN function returns an estimate of the number of months between expression1 and expression2.
sample:
SELECT MONTHS_BETWEEN (PRENDATE, PRSDATE)  
       FROM PROJECT
       WHERE PROJNO='AD3100'
